UniprotID	Q99489-2
Accession	Q99489;A8KAG4;Q5JXM4;Q5JXM5;Q5JXM6;Q8N552
EntryName	OXDD_HUMAN
ProteinName	D-aspartate oxidase (DASOX) (DASPO) (DDO) (EC 1.4.3.1)
GeneName	DDO
Length	282
Function	Selectively catalyzes the oxidative deamination of acidic amino acids (PubMed:1991137, PubMed:20603179, PubMed:23391306, PubMed:25747990, PubMed:28393897, PubMed:28560262, PubMed:28629864, PubMed:29292239, PubMed:31914658, PubMed:32553892, PubMed:9163533). Suppresses the level of D-aspartate in the brain, an amino acid that can act as an agonist for glutamate receptors (PubMed:28560262). Protects the organism from the toxicity of D-amino acids (By similarity). May also function in the intestine (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Peroxisome matrix; Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Peroxisome matrix; Peroxisome matrix
Disorder	
ExposeBuried
